function.name: percentage_calc
function.description: Calculate the percentage of a part relative to a whole

name: percentage_calc
short_description: Calculate the percentage of a part relative to a whole.
long_description: Calculates the percentage by dividing the part by the whole and multiplying by 100. Useful for determining the percentage representation of a subset in relation to a total.

parameters.name: part
parameters.description: The subset or portion of the total

example_user_queries: What is the percentage of 30 compared to 150?
Calculate the percentage of 45 out of 90
What is the percentage of 20 compared to 80?
Calculate the percentage of 80 out of 400
